verses.verse: At that time <WH6256> the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me <WH6458>, Hew you two <WH8147> tablets <WH3871> of stone <WH68> like unto the first <WH7223>, and come up <WH5927> unto me into the mountain <WH2022>, and make <WH6213> you an ark <WH727> of wood <WH6086>.
And I will write <WH3789> on the tablets <WH3871> the words <WH1697> that were in the first <WH7223> tablets <WH3871> which you brakest <WH7665>, and you shall put <WH7760> them in the ark <WH727>.

And I made <WH6213> an ark <WH727> of acacia <WH7848> wood <WH6086>, and hewed <WH6458> two <WH8147> tablets <WH3871> of stone <WH68> like unto the first <WH7223>, and went up <WH5927> into the mountain <WH2022>, having the two <WH8147> tablets <WH3871> in my hand <WH3027>.

And he wrote <WH3789> on the tablets <WH3871>, according to the first <WH7223> writing <WH4385>, the ten <WH6235> commandments <WH1697>, which the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> unto you in the mountain <WH2022> out of the middle <WH8432> of the fire <WH784> in the day <WH3117> of the assembly <WH6951>: and the Lord <WH3068> gave them unto me <WH5414>.

And I turned <WH6437> myself and came down <WH3381> from the mountain <WH2022>, and put <WH7760> the tablets <WH3871> in the ark <WH727> which I had made <WH6213>; and there they be <WH3068>, as the Lord commanded me <WH6680>.

And the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> took their journey <WH5265> from Beeroth of the sons of Jaakan <WH885> to Mosera <WH4149>: there Aaron <WH175> died <WH4191>, and there he was buried <WH6912>; and Eleazar <WH499> his son <WH1121> ministered in the priest <WH3547>'s office in his stead.
From there they journeyed <WH5265> unto Gudgodah <WH1412>; and from Gudgodah <WH1412> to Jotbath <WH3193>, a land <WH776> of rivers <WH5158> of waters <WH4325>.

At that time <WH6256> the Lord <WH3068> separated <WH914> the tribe <WH7626> of Levi <WH3878>, to carry <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the Lord <WH3068>, to stand <WH5975> before <WH6440> the Lord <WH3068> to minister <WH8334> unto him <WH1288>, and to bless in his name <WH8034>, unto this day <WH3117>.

Why Levi <WH3878> has no part <WH2506> nor inheritance <WH5159> with his brothers <WH251>; the Lord <WH3068> is his inheritance <WH5159>, according as the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> promised him <WH1696>.

And I stayed <WH5975> in the mountain <WH2022>, according to the first <WH7223> time <WH3117>, forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights <WH3915>; and the Lord <WH3068> listened <WH8085> unto me at that time <WH6471> also <WH3068>, and the Lord would <WH14> not destroy you <WH7843>.

And the Lord <WH3068> said <WH559> unto me <WH6965>, Arise, take <WH3212> your journey <WH4550> before <WH6440> the people <WH5971>, that they may go in <WH935> and possess <WH3423> the land <WH776>, which I swore <WH7650> unto their fathers <WH1> to give unto them <WH5414>.

And now <WH3478>, Israel, what does the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> require <WH7592> of you <WH3372>, but to fear the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>, to walk <WH3212> in all his ways <WH1870>, and to love <WH157> him <WH5647>, and to serve the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> with all your heart <WH3824> and with all your soul <WH5315>,
To keep <WH8104> the commandments <WH4687> of the Lord <WH3068>, and his statutes <WH2708>, which I command <WH6680> you this day <WH3117> for your good <WH2896>?
Behold <WH8064>, the heaven and the heaven <WH8064> of heavens <WH8064> is the Lord <WH3068>'s your God <WH430>, the earth also <WH776>, with all that in it is.

Only the Lord <WH3068> had a delight <WH2836> in your fathers <WH1> to love <WH157> them <WH977>, and he chose their seed <WH2233> after <WH310> them <WH5971>, even you above all people, as it is this day <WH3117>.
Circumcise <WH4135> therefore the foreskin <WH6190> of your heart <WH3824>, and be no more stiffnecked <WH6203>.

For the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> is God <WH430> of gods <WH430>, and Lord <WH113> of lords <WH113>, a great <WH1419> God <WH410>, a mighty <WH1368>, and a terrible <WH3372>, which regards <WH5375> not persons <WH6440>, nor takes <WH3947> reward <WH7810>:
He does execute <WH6213> the judgment <WH4941> of the fatherless <WH3490> and widow <WH490>, and loves <WH157> the stranger <WH1616>, in giving <WH5414> him food <WH3899> and clothes <WH8071>.
Love <WH157> you therefore the stranger <WH1616>: for you were strangers <WH1616> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
You shall fear <WH3372> the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430>; him shall you serve <WH5647>, and to him shall you cleave <WH1692>, and swear <WH7650> by his name <WH8034>.
He is your praise <WH8416>, and he is your God <WH430>, that has done <WH6213> for you these great <WH1419> and terrible things <WH3372>, which your eyes <WH5869> have seen <WH7200>.

Your fathers <WH1> went down <WH3381> into Egypt <WH4714> with sixty and ten <WH7657> persons <WH5315>; and now the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> has made <WH7760> you as the stars <WH3556> of heaven <WH8064> for multitude <WH7230>.
